name: Explosions Per Second
description:
Explosions per second                                              (now with a html5 version available)

Dear reader this is quick game designed for the extra credits "awesome per second" game jam. To adhere to this theme in both theme and the message of the video, that the theme was based off, I have created this game to be quick and awesome thus MAXIMIZING the AWESOMENESS per SECOND. 

There are no screenshots as this game is indented to be finished in 60 seconds or less with a better score given for being quick, as such screenshots would ruin the surprise.

Thank you for playing

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

I have also included the HTML5 version, however should you experience difficulties please try the executable as that is the preferred version.

please note that since it was made originally for windows PC, you will need to refresh your browser to try again.
